actions.action: Add online observation normalization: maintain running mean & variance of state features across all rollouts; before feeding observations to the network, standard-score them (x ← (x−μ)/√(σ²+ϵ)).  This stabilizes input scales, lets the shared actor-critic net learn smoother value gradients, and is especially helpful in MountainCarContinuous where position (≈ [-1.2, 0.6]) and velocity (≈ [-0.07, 0.07]) differ in magnitude.  Implement with a small momentum update each rollout and stop gradients through μ, σ.

This stabilizes input scales, lets the shared actor-critic net learn smoother value gradients, and is especially helpful in MountainCarContinuous where position (≈ [-1.2, 0.6]) and velocity (≈ [-0.07, 0.07]) differ in magnitude.  Implement with a small momentum update each rollout and stop gradients through μ, σ.'

actions.action: Implement online observation normalization: track a running mean μ and variance σ² of each state dimension across rollouts, and feed standardized observations (x − μ) / √(σ² + ε) to both actor and critic. This stabilizes input scales, speeds learning, and should boost PPO performance on MountainCarContinuous.

actions.action: Add observation normalization: keep running mean µ and variance σ² of each state feature across all collected roll-outs (update with exponential moving average). Before passing observations to the actor-critic network, standardise them as (x − µ)/√(σ²+ε).  This simple preprocessing stabilises input scales, mitigates non-stationarity, and typically yields faster, more robust learning on MountainCarContinuous where position and velocity magnitudes differ greatly.

This simple preprocessing stabilises input scales, mitigates non-stationarity, and typically yields faster, more robust learning on MountainCarContinuous where position and velocity magnitudes differ greatly.'

actions.action: Add a simple entropy-coefficient schedule: start PPO with a higher entropy weight (e.g., 0.2) and linearly decay it to a small value (e.g., 0.01) over training. This encourages broad exploration early—helpful for overcoming MountainCar’s sparse reward—while gradually shifting focus to exploitation once the goal is found, yielding more stable convergence and higher final returns.
